trans-unit.source: Contact Microsoft Support | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Contact Microsoft Support | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a support request and start a support session on your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a support request and start a support session on your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: If you encounter any issues with your Microsoft Azure StorSimple solution, you can create a service request for technical support.
trans-unit.target: If you encounter any issues with your Microsoft Azure StorSimple solution, you can create a service request for technical support.

trans-unit.source: In an online session with your support engineer, you may also need to start a support session on your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: In an online session with your support engineer, you may also need to start a support session on your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: This article walks you through the process of creating a support request and also starting a support session in the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: This article walks you through the process of creating a support request and also starting a support session in the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to create a support request:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to create a support request:

trans-unit.source: A support request can be created through the <linkText>Management Portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: A support request can be created through the <linkText>Management Portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In the Management Portal, click your Account Name and then click Contact Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: In the Management Portal, click your Account Name and then click Contact Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Contact MS Support via ManagementPortal</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Contact MS Support via ManagementPortal</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Contact Microsoft Support dialog:
trans-unit.target: In the Contact Microsoft Support dialog:

trans-unit.source: From the drop-down list, select the target Subscription associated with your StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: From the drop-down list, select the target Subscription associated with your StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: Specify Support Type as Technical.
trans-unit.target: Specify Support Type as Technical.

trans-unit.source: You need a paid support plan to enable Technical Support.
trans-unit.target: You need a paid support plan to enable Technical Support.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon Check icon to Create Ticket.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon Check icon to Create Ticket.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Support window, from the Product drop-down list, choose StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Support window, from the Product drop-down list, choose StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Contact Microsoft Support - Product</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Contact Microsoft Support - Product</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Follow the on-screen instructions to properly classify your request and provide a clear and specific description of your problem.
trans-unit.target: Follow the on-screen instructions to properly classify your request and provide a clear and specific description of your problem.

trans-unit.source: After you have submitted your request, a Support engineer will contact you as soon as possible to proceed with your request.
trans-unit.target: After you have submitted your request, a Support engineer will contact you as soon as possible to proceed with your request.

trans-unit.source: To troubleshoot any issues that you might experience with the StorSimple device, you will need to engage with the Microsoft Support team.
trans-unit.target: To troubleshoot any issues that you might experience with the StorSimple device, you will need to engage with the Microsoft Support team.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Support may need to use a support session to log on to your device.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Support may need to use a support session to log on to your device.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to start a support session:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to start a support session:

trans-unit.source: Access the device directly by using the serial console or through a telnet session from a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Access the device directly by using the serial console or through a telnet session from a remote computer.

trans-unit.source: To do this, follow the steps in <linkText>Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To do this, follow the steps in <linkText>Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In the session that opens, press the Enter key to get a command prompt.
trans-unit.target: In the session that opens, press the Enter key to get a command prompt.

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu, select option 1, Log in with full access.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu, select option 1, Log in with full access.

trans-unit.source: At the prompt, type the following password:
trans-unit.target: At the prompt, type the following password:

trans-unit.source: Password1
trans-unit.target: Password1

trans-unit.source: At the prompt, type the following command:
trans-unit.target: At the prompt, type the following command:

trans-unit.source: Enable-HcsSupportAccess
trans-unit.target: Enable-HcsSupportAccess

trans-unit.source: An encrypted string will be presented to you.
trans-unit.target: An encrypted string will be presented to you.

trans-unit.source: Copy this string into a text editor such as Notepad.
trans-unit.target: Copy this string into a text editor such as Notepad.

trans-unit.source: Save this string and send it in an email message to Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: Save this string and send it in an email message to Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: You can disable support access by running Disable-HcsSupportAccess.
trans-unit.target: You can disable support access by running Disable-HcsSupportAccess.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple device will also attempt to disable support access 8 hours after the session was initiated.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple device will also attempt to disable support access 8 hours after the session was initiated.

trans-unit.source: It is a best practice to change your StorSimple device credentials after initiating a support session.
trans-unit.target: It is a best practice to change your StorSimple device credentials after initiating a support session.
